meanings.sent1: I am prechoosing my outfit for tomorrow's party.
meanings.sent2: She always prechooses her meals for the week on Sundays.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to be prechoosing which spot to nap in.
meanings.sent4: The student is prechoosing the best time to study for the exam.
meanings.sent5: By prechoosing his words carefully, he avoided any misunderstandings.

meanings.definition: The act of selecting in advance.
meanings.sent1: Her prechoosing of the movie made the decision easier for the group.
meanings.sent2: The prechoosing of the menu items helped speed up the ordering process.
meanings.sent3: The prechoosing of the vacation destination led to a fun surprise trip.
meanings.sent4: The prechoosing of the team captain was a strategic move.
meanings.sent5: The prechoosing of the winner was kept secret until the end of the competition.
